name: Face Recognition System
desc: Face Recognition is a technology in computer vision. In Face recognition / detection we locate and visualize the human faces in any digital image.

name: Online Food Delivery
desc: An online food ordering system is a web-based application that stimulates the foodies to put food orders through internet by locating the restaurant.

name: College Management System
desc: College management system manages the student and lecturer data.It stores, organizes, and manages a large amount of information within a single application.

name: Table Tennis Game
desc: Table Tennis Game project is developed using JavaScript and HTML canvas.The player has to move stick like a TT bat to reflect the ball back to the opponent and make a score.
